Yeah, my bot's a drunk. I think almost everyone meant him when they said the bum.

::::

Having disposed of Dogged, the bot hears someone call him, turning and seeing a sword and shield flying at him. He grabs both, looking briefly to see who had thrown it and finding no one who matched his mental description of someone who'd have these sorts of weapons. He turns, seeing Repungus going at Dogged, and finds a new target, firing his remaining shoulder missile launcher at the debris that Branded was behind while heading toward it.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Cyberwolf, you'll have to repost with Branding. Interception of 
> weapon fire is frowned upon. =)
> 
> --- Pacifix / Crossroads ---
> 
> Pacifix misses his grab, and a sharp pain stabs into his chest and 
> he grunts. The force of the blow knocks him backwards a step, and 
> almost sets him off balance, and denting his heavy barricade mode 
> armour. He steps back again, and levels his freeze cannons at 
> Arty's shoulders in an attempt to stop the bot from moving his arms 
> at the shoulder. He fires twice with each arm freeze cannon for the 
> joints.
> 
> Crossroads notices the strength advantage that the new bot 
> fighting with them has, and yells to the bot, (the bum) "Hey large 
> new bot, (he describes the bot, kinda like "hey you over there with 
> the red shirt" 'cept I don't know what the bot really looks like =P), 
> CATCH!" he transforms into plasma shield and sword mode, 
> launching himself at the bum, hilt and handle ready to be grabbed. 
> (Yan, if bum doesn't want Crossroads, he'll just transform again =)
